definitions.definition: Alternative spelling of Pangaea : ( geology ) A former supercontinent that included all the landmasses of the earth before the Triassic period and that broke up into Laurasia and Gondwana .

main_definition: Alternative spelling of Pangaea : ( geology ) A former supercontinent that included all the landmasses of the earth before the Triassic period and that broke up into Laurasia and Gondwana .
